channel.title: Anyone read comic books?
channel.description: My gf loves them and wanted me to get into them. I have looked at marvel's website and I looked at the wallpaper. I liked Moon Knight and like 3 other's that had to do with the end of the world. (Or so it seemed) Comments?

item.title: Anyone read comic books?
item.dc:creator: @Drunk_On_Java Drunk On Java
item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

[quote=“anon95490785, post:1, topic:16688”]Your “gf” wanted you to read comic books?

Wtf, is she some sort of hardcore nerd?

No offence, but I thought comic books are things that we used to read at age 5-6.[/quote]
She’s a nerd.
Some are actually good with adult language.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone read comic books?

item.description:

My gf loves them and wanted me to get into them. I have looked at marvel’s website and I looked at the wallpaper.
I liked Moon Knight and like 3 other’s that had to do with the end of the world. (Or so it seemed)
